Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's nice of you to come all the way to
the construction site.

But I'm all right.


I just hope it inspires Mattison to see her
papa working hard.

Anyway, I've been looking at ways to
make use of the Zonai devices that
have fallen around here.
It's all part of this <clr:0000>development project<clr:ffff>
I'm doing with the folks of the Zonai
Survey Team.
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The ground around here is really loose.


Sometimes recovering a <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff> or
moving the ruins causes it to <clr:0000>collapse<clr:ffff>.
Greeting_Rain:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Truth is,<sp:5:0:0> I'm working this hard because it distracts
me from worrying about Mattison.

Oh, my sweet little girl... I hope she's not getting
soaked by the rain.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>If anything happened to the folks from
<clr:0000>YunoboCo<clr:ffff>, this place would wind up
covered in Zonai ruins.
And it'd be especially awful since
<clr:0000>President Yunobo <clr:ffff>went out of his way
to help us.
So, no carelessness and no accidents.
Oh, and make real sure you <clr:0000>watch<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>where
you step<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, for starters, those balloons
the Zonai Survey Team is using...
we made them.
You see, there's this Zonai device that
floats when you add heat.

We attach a basket to these things and
then folks can jump in and go for a ride.

And right now, we're working on these
vehicles that use a wheel-like device...
but this device rotates automatically.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Truthfully, we've got the vehicle base
down, but safety and handling is still an
issue. Can't say they're practical yet.
Talk49:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I was supposed to meet <clr:0000>Kilton<clr:ffff> here.
So where is he?

He said he'd come after finishing an
errand near <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff>...
Talk_0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Sorry about that. We were having a chat,
and I didn't notice you there.
Greeting_Morning:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Truth is,<sp:5:0:0> I'm working this hard because it distracts
me from worrying about Mattison.

Oh, my sweet little girl... Will she be OK waking up
in the morning without us?<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Greeting_Evening:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Truth is,<sp:5:0:0> I'm working this hard because it distracts
me from worrying about Mattison.

Oh, my sweet little girl... Is she getting to bed
early enough?<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Near_0004: What am I going to do?
Greeting_Noon:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Truth is,<sp:5:0:0> I'm working this hard because it distracts
me from worrying about Mattison.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:LaughS_00>You showed me that picture of my
daughter and now I'm in such a good
mood, I can't wait to get to work!
You'll see, I'm going to make so many
monster sculptures, there won't be room
enough to hold 'em all.
Of course...someone's going to need to
bring me some pictures to work off of.
Greeting_Thunder:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Truth is,<sp:5:0:0> I'm working this hard because it distracts
me from worrying about Mattison.

Oh, my sweet little girl... I hope the thunder isn't
frightening her.<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
Talk_0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_01>That's enough of that. <sp:5:1:0>I should try to
focus on my work.
Talk_0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I better check in with the YunoboCo folks
to see how the Zonai ruins recovery is
going, and then...<sp:5:0:0>hmm...
Talk_0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If it's not too much to ask, it would mean
a lot if I could see a picture of Mattison in
Gerudo Town...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><snd:Sad_01>Ah, never mind me. <sp:5:1:0>I should probably
try to focus on work right now.
Talk_0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>We figured out a use for the wheel-like
Zonai device, but what else can we do
with these things? <sp:5:0:0>Hmmm...
Talk_0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We set aside the northern end of the
construction site for <clr:0000>vehicle development<clr:ffff>.

If you're curious about that stuff, chat
with Fernison. She's the survey-team
member in charge over there.
Ah, but you'll have to wait. She's busy
working with some experts we invited
to help out.
Talk_0032:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Oh! Mattison! There you are!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>I didn't think I'd get to see you so soon.


Aw, I can see it in this picture...you're
working hard and doing your very best.

Your papa will try to work hard and do
his best too. I've gotta keep up with you,
after all!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The balloons the Zonai Survey Team uses
are made out of a basket attached to a
Zonai device that floats when heated.
Now we're working on a vehicle that uses
a wheel-like device that rotates by itself.

But...well...there are still a few handling
and safety issues, and that's slowing
down our work on it.
Talk_0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We've set aside the northern end of the
construction site for <clr:0000>vehicle development<clr:ffff>.

Sounds like they've finally found a way to
control the vehicles. That means we can
start testing them out for real.
If you're curious, go chat with Fernison.
She's the survey-team member in charge
of that area.
Talk_0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Let's see, while I've got a spare minute
to think, what else should I get
done? <sp:5:0:0>Hmm...
Talk_0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I hope it inspires Mattison to see her
papa working so hard.<sp:5:1:0>

I've partnered up with the Zonai Survey
Team on a<clr:0000> project<clr:ffff>. I'm trying to come up
with ways to put the Zonai devices to use.
Talk43:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I appreciate you helping me with Mattison.
That was a rough patch there, but I feel
a lot better about things thanks to you.
Talk_0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There has to be something I can do for
Mattison. I'm her papa, after all. <sp:5:0:0>Hmm...
Talk44:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>I admit, hearing about the sand shroud
that Gerudo Town is dealing with... Well,
it's had me pretty worried.
But she's safe with her Gerudo escort.
I'm sure they'll take good care of her.
Talk_0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, hey there. You here to check up
on me?
Talk45:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Rhondson is back to working on those
dream homes, so I better get back to
work too.
Ah, sorry. If you don't watch out, I'll start
talking your ear off again. You've been a
good listener. Thanks for that.
Talk46:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm supposed to meet a customer here,
but he hasn't showed up.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>His name is <clr:0000>Kilton<clr:ffff>. I hope he hasn't run
into any trouble.

He said he'd head this way after finishing
an errand near <clr:0000>Woodland Stable<clr:ffff>.
Talk_0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Ah, <sp:5:0:0>Mattison... Your papa will be brave
and strong, just like you.
